Package application

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
application.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Stores information entered by user from GUI and processes Events. This class is responsible for implementing the functionality of the GUI and responding to events. Buttons and text fields are updated dynamically based on user selections.
Author:
Matthew Brandao, Armit Patel
